page.title: 14Whitehills Playground Games
page.content:
{Tag} Chasing Game. Person touched {becomes 'Ittie'} or '{The Mannie'. { {Stick In The Mud.}As Tag but person touched stands legs apart and may be freed by someone crawling between.
{High Tackie.} AS Tag but any point above ground level e.g. a kerb or dustbin provides a den or refuge.
{Wallie} Kicking a ball against a low wall till someone sends it over, when a goal is scored against him/her.
{Chinese Skipping }Double rope of joined elastic bands is kept apart by player at each end by her feet., while others follow a set pattern of 'Ins and Outs' e.g. Jump In, One Side, Other Side, Two Legs In, Two Legs Out,Jump Out.
